title: How to Call the United States from Thailand: Phone & Other Methods

steps.title: Dial Thailand’s exit code “001.”
steps.content: Dial Thailand’s exit code “001.” To make an international call, you must dial your country’s specific exit code. The exit code will direct your call out of Thailand. In this case, to exit a call out of Thailand, your number will begin with “001.” [1] X Research source These codes may also be called International Direct Dialing or International Subscriber Dialing codes. If you are making an international call from a mobile phone to another mobile phone, the exit code can often be replaced with the + (plus) sign. You will enter the + (plus) sign directly before entering the country code. [2] X Research source To find out if you should use the + (plus) sign rather than Thailand’s exit code, talk to your mobile provider. You may acquire additional long-distance charges when making international calls from a cell phone or landline.

steps.title: Dial country code “1” after the exit code.
steps.content: Dial country code “1” after the exit code. Country codes are used to direct calls to the specific country you are trying to reach. The country code “1” is shared with a few other countries, so make sure you are entering the correct area code when making your call. [3] X Research source Your dialed number should begin with “001-1.”

steps.title: Enter the 3-digit area code.
steps.content: Enter the 3-digit area code. Each state in the U.S. has its own 3-digit area code. Make sure you dial the correct code, as many are similar but can take you to different locations. Verify the area code before making your call. [4] X Research source Always double-check the area code you are entering. Misdialing even one number can direct you to a different state. For example, if you are calling Denver, CO, which has two area codes, “303” and” “720,” misdialing one number can direct you to parts of Ohio with a “330” area code or areas of Maine that use a “207” area code. For example, if you are trying to reach Denver, CO, your dial, so far, should read “001-1-303.”

steps.title: Enter the 7-digit phone number.
steps.content: Enter the 7-digit phone number. Phone numbers in the United States are 10 digits long, including the area codes. Since you have already found and entered your area code, all you need to do is type in the remaining 7 digits of the number for the person you are trying to reach. [5] X Research source At this point, the phone number you’ve dialed should look something like “001-1-303-123-4567.”

steps.title: Press the “call” button to complete your call.
steps.content: Press the “call” button to complete your call. Now that you have all your numbers entered, you can initiate your call by pressing the “call” or “send” button. Always make sure to double-check the numbers you’ve dialed to ensure that you have entered them correctly. There are 6 main time zones in the United States, so please make sure you choose an appropriate time to call your friends, family, or colleagues. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Find and purchase a low-rate calling card.
steps.content: Find and purchase a low-rate calling card. Calling cards are prepaid cards that allow you to charge local or international phone calls to one account. You will purchase a certain amount of minutes on your card rather than getting charged by your phone company. Make sure to compare calling card rates before you make your purchase. Calling cards can be purchased at many local grocery stores, convenience stores, and online. Prices can vary anywhere from 0.33 THB ($0.01 USD) to 3,3317.47 THB ($100.00 USD). Always review the terms and conditions for your prepaid card before purchasing and look for any additional service fees. Calling cards can be charged after your call or prepaid at the time of purchase. Options such as Pinpoint allow you to choose the country you are calling and the number of minutes you want to purchase.

steps.title: Begin your call by dialing the access number.
steps.content: Begin your call by dialing the access number. Before making an international call, you will need to locate the access number on your prepaid calling card. You will call this number, connecting you to the calling card company. Follow the prompted directions, as this is how you will begin your call. Most access numbers are on the back of your calling card.

steps.title: Enter the PIN on your card to connect to your account.
steps.content: Enter the PIN on your card to connect to your account. Each calling card will be provided with its PIN. When prompted, enter the PIN located on your card. The PIN allows you to connect to your personalized account, which will track the time you spend on international calls. Your PIN number will often be under a covered area on the back of your card. This area can be exposed by gently rubbing it with a coin or fingernail.

steps.title: Dial the number as if you were using a regular phone.
steps.content: Dial the number as if you were using a regular phone. These numbers will include the exit code, country code, area code, and the 7-digit phone number. Double-check that you have entered each of these numbers correctly, especially because you are paying for every minute of your phone call. Your number should look something like “access code-PIN number-001-1-303-123-4567.”

steps.title: Use free apps for video chatting.
steps.content: Use free apps for video chatting. If you are looking for ways to call the United States for free, look at apps such as WhatsApp , Skype, and Viber. You must make sure that the person you are trying to reach has the same app downloaded and is connected to a Wi-Fi network. [7] X Research source For these apps to work, you must be connected to Wi-Fi or use your mobile data. In some cases, Skype may charge a small fee for international calls.

steps.title: Use social media to stay in touch.
steps.content: Use social media to stay in touch. Social media is a great way to stay up-to-date with your friends in other countries and offers a way to connect for free. Sites such as Facebook have messaging apps that will allow you to message, call, and video chat for free. [8] X Research source To stay connected through social media, make sure that the person you are trying to reach has an account created for the same site and has downloaded the app.

steps.title: Find apps that let you call landlines for a small fee.
steps.content: Find apps that let you call landlines for a small fee. If you want to make voice calls to landlines, Skype is a great resource that comes in handy when traveling. These apps will charge you a small fee to make international calls to landlines, but it will be cheaper than going through your mobile phone provider. [9] X Research source
